text: Zhang Jin (; born 9 May 1972) is a former Chinese badminton player. She was the gold medalists at the 1997 Busan East Asian Games in the women's doubles and team events, also won a silver medal in the mixed doubles. == Achievements == === World Cup === Mixed doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font- size: 90%;" !
